column1: # Change above global settings to determine latency to transfer KV cache amongst all nodes.
# Each node's connections are semicolon separated and it is a list of nodes it is connected to
# A node is labeled as Chassis#.Node#.
# You can add preferred mellanox node using "PChassis#.Node#".
# IMPORTANT: Ordering is important for mellanox conections
# {1.1;1.3;1.2} -- this node is connected to chassis 1 node 1
# {4.0;4.2;4.3;5.2} -- this node is connected to chassis 4 node 0
# {4.0;4.2;4.3;5.2;P1.0;P2.0} -- this node is connected to chassis 4 node 0
#								It is also connected to chassis 1 node 0
column2: and chassis 2 node 0 via mellanox. The preference order

column1: #								matters so data from this node will go to 1.0 first
# A few different configurations are provided below that you can comment out
# This file must exist in your home directory (~)
